info.name: pastel pink dashboard 2.0!
info.description:
hey! this is an edited version of my last theme. it's updated to the current tumblr model! v1 is still usable, but this version is smoother, easier to see, and much cuter. please read the additional info, change log, and credits. 

recommended styling (logos, icons, etc)
japanese tumblr logo: http://userstyles.org/styles/80450/tumblr-logo-in-japanese 
ask box, help, etc: http://userstyles.org/styles/73214/cute-pixel-tumblrbar 
my tumblr: http://nnadoka.co.vu
info.additionalInfo: fixes !!! : !!view redux edit blog themes without seeing dashboard background!! see your follower count menu, more bold, white text, saturated background. easier to see in general. circular menu buttons, (mail, options, etc.) pink text 100%% matte, no shadows. quote boarders, url links (in reblogable text posts) are a black shade. additional: pink menu text (for new posts) sleek flat no shadows my tumblr: http://nnadoka.co.vu
